name: Cosmopolitan 1934

ingredients.name: 1 Orange zest from a flamed orange peel

preparation:
With some homemade raspberry syrup and NOLET'S Finest Gin, you can take this classic to the next level.

Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and fill with ice.

Shake, and fine strain into a large coupe.

Garnish with zest from a flamed orange peel and a dehydrated orange wheel (a fresh orange wheel can also be used).
